title: Exceptional
text: Location with great staff to help you and listen to your request Bit expensive for a non sea facing room

title: I will go back again
text: Excellent spread of indian and continental breakfast Service ans staff

title: Good
text: Good sized room and decent bathroomGood location, now that the coastal road is operationalDecent breakfast Not enough sitting space in the lobbyNo place to have a cigar in the eveningRoom card sokmetimes didnt work well in the liftFlush didnt work well in the room; had to call housekeeping to fix

title: Can highly recommend this place. One of the best experiences I ever had. Super friendly and professional staff, good foo
Will be back again.
text: Everything was great. We celebrated my husband's 60th birthday and they went out of their way to make it special for him. Nothing
